description.en_us:
## Update Note:
- Migrate [Project]: Migrated the project to the ZalithLauncher organization
---
- Adjust [Logs]: Disabled missing warning for flite, log warnings for LWJGL compatibility issues
- Adjust [Account]: Adjusted account refresh and login logic
- Adjust [Detection]: Added check cooldown for update detection and notification detection
- Adjust [Install Game]: Adjusted the animation for entering the interface
description.zh_cn:
## 更新内容：
- 迁移[项目]: 将项目迁移至 ZalithLauncher 组织
---
- 调整[日志]: 禁用 flite 缺失警告、LWGJL 兼容性问题的日志警告
- 调整[账号]: 调整账号刷新、登录的逻辑
- 调整[检测]: 为更新检测、通知检测添加检查冷却
- 调整[安装游戏]: 调整进入界面的动画
description.zh_tw:
## 更新內容：
- 遷移[專案]：將專案遷移至 ZalithLauncher 組織
---
- 調整[日誌]：禁用 flite 缺失警告、LWJGL 兼容性問題的日誌警告
- 調整[帳號]：調整帳號刷新、登錄的邏輯
- 調整[檢測]：為更新檢測、通知檢測增加檢查冷卻時間
- 調整[安裝遊戲]：調整進入介面的動畫
